entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this morning. Periods of rain beginning this morning. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Fog patches. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 20 this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 14 except 10 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
